justification: Correctly targets Team B’s acute RB shortage and offers two Tier 3 committee backs, while requesting a TE from B’s surplus (Roberts is a Tier 4 among multiple TEs). Distinguishes A’s goal (TE upgrade) from B’s needs (immediate RB help for 0-8 team). Trade is roster- and role-coherent with no injury/bye conflicts. Rationale is concise but omits deeper cues (B’s TE depth, urgency for immediate starters, consensus valuation), limiting explanation depth.
